view model -
connects view (fragments and activities) to logic.
Has public methods for views to access but doesnt care directly to views.

and methods (crud) to be implemented by framework layer.

div.font: datasources are per topic basis. (departments and employees are separate datasources since they are different topics despite related)

font.font: contains methods but implementation are datasource's methods.

b.font: Can have multiple datasources per repository.

span.font: a.k.a interactors, is all about breaking down of business actions

- call inject method of viewmodel factory by instantiating
